entry.title: Game: Crystalis (NES, 1990)
entry.content:
I remember playing this game as a kid and thinking it was cool. I just remember that it is an Action RPG. I played today for an hour with my son and we beat the first dungeon. It's very fun. There's a little too much grinding... I feel like I can't move forward and search, but I have to consciously try to get money and EXP. But, it's fun. The charge shot is essential for staying out of harm, but it makes you less flexible, so it's a nice mechanic to put you in stressful situations.

Total time: 0:59
